dc:title: Archive of historical data on the testing volume for COVID-19
dc:creator: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control
dc:subject: historical data on the testing volume for COVID-19 in EU
dc:description: - columns: country, country code, year week, level, region, region name, new cases, tests done, population, testing rate, positivity rate, testing data source
positivity rate: 100 x number of new confirmed cases/number of tests done per week
tests_done: number of tests done within week
level: Whether national or subnational (regional) level data
region: 2-letter ISO country code where level is national. Nuts code or alternative administrative level (determined by Member States) for subnational region
region_name: Country name where level is national or name of region where level is subnational
testing data source: Country API Country GitHub Country website Manual webscraping Other Survey TESSy: data provided directly by Member States to ECDC via TESSy
dc:publisher: European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control
dc:rights: Information and documents made available on ECDC web pages and for which ECDC owns the copyright are public and may be reproduced, adapted and/or distributed, totally or in part, irrespective of the means and/or the formats used, provided that ECDC is always acknowledged as the original source of the material. Such acknowledgement must be included in each copy of the material.
